title: Imagine Your First WorldTour Race Being the Tour of Flanders: That Just Happened to Colby Simmons
content:
Colby Simmons went straight from DEVO to the hardest race of the year in a wild few weeks: 'It's something you can't say no to.'

Read the full article at Imagine Your First WorldTour Race Being the Tour of Flanders: That Just Happened to Colby Simmons on Velo.
author: ahood
